name: christopher fabian
description: Chris Fabian, co-founder and leader of Giga, an startup by UNICEF and ITU, aims to connect every school to the internet. He built UNICEF's cryptocurrency fund, ($20M in Eth and BTC). A leader in open-source technology policy, Chris has helped shape blockchain strategies for Ministries and Central Banks globally. Previously, he founded UNICEF’s Innovation Unit, advised UN Secretary-Generals, and was named one of Time's "100 Most Influential People" and WIRED’s "25 People Changing the World"
